page.title: 04TRADE IN SHREWLEY AREA
page.content:
Shop trade in the area was very basic. There were only a few shops situated in our area. One of the shops was a small newsagents and the other was a small grocers which had a post office inside. One of the advantages of only having a few shops would be that most people would depend on the shops for goods. In the area there was a small mobile shop which travelled around the Shrewley area several times a week. Here is its rota.
FISHMONGER came once a week. GROCERS came twice a week. GENERAL came three times a week.
Other trade includes milk.The Milk Mar- keting Board tankers come regularly to pick up milk from the farms.
